code: import axiosClient from'./axiosClient';var ChatRoomsAPI={getMessageByRoomId:function getMessageByRoomId(roomId){var url="/chatrooms/getById?roomId=".concat(roomId);return axiosClient.get(url);},createNewRoom:function createNewRoom(){var url="/chatrooms/createNewRoom";return axiosClient.post(url);},addMessage:function addMessage(body){var url="/chatrooms/addMessage";return axiosClient.put(url,body);}};export default ChatRoomsAPI;
